title: In Rathmines, plans progress for primary-care centre and housing
content: The HSE has filed a planning application for a new health-care centre at the Gulistan bring centre site.

title: Look at converting some social homes in city-centre flats into cost-rentals, says Taoiseach’s group
content: No decision has been made on whether that will happen, a Dublin City Council spokesperson has said. But it hasn’t been ruled out.

title: RTB tribunal finds Tramco renters are licencees not tenants, overturning a previous decision
content: The landlord argued that the renters in the Rathmines building were hotel guests and that they didn’t have exclusive occupation.

title: Credit unions cleared to more than triple mortgage and business lending
content: Credit unions will be able to more than triple their current mortgage and business lending after the Central Bank gave the go-ahead to changes to lending regulations for the sector.

title: Grieving parents of Harvey Morrison Sherratt (9) vow to fight for other children with scoliosis as surgery waiting list increases
content: The number of children waiting for scoliosis surgery has risen again since the Government took office in January, up from 112 to 131.

title: Presidential hopeful Gareth Sheridan defends mother’s role in housing project objection
content: Gareth Sheridan insists his mother’s objection to a Dublin housing project was made in good faith and at her employer’s direction

title: Bernard O’Shea: Five things I had to explain to my kids about video rental shops
content: Once a sacred Friday-night ritual, now a baffling life lesson for my children.
